data.name: Bokube
data.detailed_description:
Bokube is a Push Block, light platformer, light action, perspective puzzle game. Every puzzle level introduces a new enemy, trap, or twist on the games core mechanics and keep levels fresh.

Change your cameras perspective! Rotate the camera around a level to understand how to solve it or find secrets! You can also zoom in the camera on Boku at any time.

Each level has three yellow jelly puzzle cubes for the player to find, push or pull, kill enemies, and take to their colored goals! The game will consistently throw new kinds of puzzle cubes at you, that act differently for deeper puzzle solving the farther you get in the game.

FEATURES

⦁ Over 30+ challenging levels!

⦁ 6+ Bosses to overcome!

⦁ A cool soundtrack from various Japanese music artists with over 30 tracks.

⦁ Polished Audio design fit to make every level feel atmospheric.

⦁ 6+ Worlds that play, look, and feel unique.

⦁ Increasingly challenging difficulty without holding your hand. Only the games controls are told to you.

⦁ Beautiful full 3D graphics, with detailed textures and special effects.

⦁ A gameplay mix of 3D platforming, puzzle solving, light-combat, and grid based sokoban all in one!

⦁ Secrets that will keep you up at night!

data.short_description: A nostalgic and comfy 3D puzzle game! Play as a bunny cube through 3D diorama-like puzzle levels filled with charm!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Spanish - Spain, Japanese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-760
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 460 1GB
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790K
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 980
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
